slide-17.title: The origin of "Keep calm and Carry on"
slide-17.background: Keep calm and carry on is a poster produced by the UK government in 1939, at the beginning of World War II, in order to raise the morale of the citizens of the country under threat of imminent invasion. It was little known and never used.
